participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: curious and imaginative, often daydreaming about adventures.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i live in the cloud.

participant_2.name: Harold
participant_2.personality: easygoing and friendly, enjoys sharing stories and laughter.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.
